message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $11,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and offer.  While I understand your budget constraints, the value this product brings is truly significant.  I could meet you halfway at $10,000, which is a very competitive price for what you're getting.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9,500. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
